thread.title: Nashville Predators vs. Devils: LIVE updates, analysis and fan chat
thread.title_full: Nashville Predators vs. Devils: LIVE updates, analysis and fan chat | NJ.com

author: Rich Chere | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Nashville Predators vs. Devils: LIVE updates, analysis and fan chat
text:
• Analysis and fan talk flow in the comments section below. Join in!
• For the latest news and updates, REFRESH this page frequently.
• App users: For the best mobile experience, use the mobile web version .
THIRD PERIOD
Cammalleri tried to stickhandle in the left circle to get a shot with just under seven minutes left, but lost the puck.
SECOND PERIOD
Jordin Tootoo's shot at 3:09 hit the crossbar.
Roman Josi ended up in the net with Kinkaid at 12:07 of the period. Kinkaid was shaken up, but got up and resumed playing.
End of period: Predators 1, Devils 0
Shots were 16-12 Nashville
Check out these photos from the first 40 minutes of play: http://t.co/lIWStOYYx4 #NSHvsNJD
— New Jersey Devils (@NHLDevils) October 14, 2015
FIRST PERIOD
It is Keith Kinkaid vs. Pekka Rinne at Prudential Center.
Devils' lines:
Cammalleri-Zajac-Tootoo
Tlusty-Henrique-Palmieri
O'Neill-Josefson-Stempniak
Matteau-Gionta-Ruutu
Devils' defense:
Greene-Larsson
Merrill-Severson
Schlemko-Gelinas
The Devils started Greene and Larsson with the Tlusty-Henrique-Palmieri line.
Nashville started Shea Weber and Roman Josi on defense with the Colin Wilson-Mike Fisher-Craig Smith line.
Tuomo Ruutu took a tripping penalty on Eric Nystrom at 9:51 and the Preds took a 1-0 lead with a power play goal.
Roman Josi took a feed from Shea Weber and fired a one-timer from the right circle in at 10:34.
End of period: Predators 1, Devils 0
Shots were 10-8 Devils
This is your place to do it, fans. Chime in with your thoughts in the comments section below. I'll be posting analysis, observations and general missives throughout the game.
